entries.title: Meta’s Gruesome Content Broke Him. Now He Wants It to Pay
entries.description: A Kenyan moderator sued the company for work-related PTSD. Next week, a new ruling on his case could signal a global reckoning for Big Tech outsourcing.

entries.title: These Apps Will Keep Your EV from Running Out of Juice
entries.description: Stay charged from point A to point B.
